{{unreferenced|date=October 2010}} {{Infobox software | name = Furius ISO Mount | title = | logo = | screenshot = [[Image:Furius ISO Mount.png|300px]] | caption = Furius ISO Mount on [[Ubuntu (operating system)|Ubuntu]] | collapsible = | author = Dean Harris (Marcus Furius) | developer = Dean Harris (Marcus Furius) | released = <!-- {{Start date|YYYY|MM|DD}} --> | discontinued = | latest release version = 0.11.2.1 | latest release date = {{Start date and age|2010|06|23}} | latest preview version = | latest preview date = <!-- {{Start date and age|YYYY|MM|DD}} --> | frequently updated = <!-- DO NOT include this parameter unless you know what it does --> | programming language = [[Python (programming language)|Python]] | operating system = [[Linux]] | platform = | size = | language = | status = | genre = ISO mounter | license = [[GNU General Public License]] | website = {{official|1=http://www.marcus-furius.com/?page_id=170}} <!--http://www.marcus-furius.com/?page_id=170 / http://www.marcus-furius.com/?p=197 --> }}
'''Furius ISO Mount''' is a free Linux program to mount (without burning to disk) and burn image files ([[ISO]], [[IMG (file format)|IMG]], [[BIN]], [[MDF]] and [[NRG]] ) using [[Gtk+]] visual interface.
== See also == {{Portal|Free software}} *[[List of ISO image software]] *[[File mounter]]
==External links== *[https://launchpad.net/furiusisomount/ Furius ISO Mount] at [[Launchpad (website)|Launchpad]]
